name: .NXL File Extension
summary: Learn about .NXL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An NXL file is an encrypted data file created by SkyDRM, a program for protecting sensitive information from unauthorized access. It contains a file, such as a .PDF, .JPEG, or .MP4 file, that is secured with SkyDRM encryption. NXL files can be configured to be accessed, edited, read, shared, and printed by specific people.

content: SkyDRM is a cloud service designed for organizations who need files that their employess access to be secure. It can be integrated into other cloud services and applications too.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
